[Click to run](https://dataexplorer.azure.com/clusters/help/databases/Samples?)

```kql
// The idea to was to combine all different aspects of KQL together!
let LetsGetStarted = range timestamp from datetime(2023-12-01) to datetime(2023-12-08) step 1d
| extend hahaha = 50;
let WhatAreAllTheseDates = datatable(timestamp: datetime, hahaha: long)
[
    datetime(2023-12-09), 40,
    datetime(2023-12-10), 20,
    datetime(2023-12-11), 74,
    datetime(2023-12-12), 20,
    datetime(2023-12-13), 56,
    datetime(2023-12-14), 24,
    datetime(2023-12-15), 34,
    datetime(2023-12-16), 22,
    datetime(2023-12-17), 47,
    datetime(2023-12-18), 54,
    datetime(2023-12-19), 34,
    datetime(2023-12-21), 12,
    datetime(2023-12-22), 42,
    datetime(2023-12-23), 117,
    datetime(2023-12-24), 32,
    datetime(2023-12-25), 10,
    datetime(2023-12-26), 33,
    datetime(2023-12-27), 115,
    datetime(2023-12-28), 25,
    datetime(2023-12-29), 29,
    datetime(2023-12-30), 50,
    datetime(2023-12-30), 44,
    datetime(2023-12-31), 40,
    datetime(2024-01-01), 56,
    datetime(2024-01-02), 43,
    datetime(2024-01-03), 48,
    datetime(2024-01-04), 116
];
let are = LetsGetStarted
| union WhatAreAllTheseDates
| make-series hahaha_series=avg(hahaha) on timestamp from datetime(2023-12-01) to datetime(2024-01-05) step 1d
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(hahaha_series, 0.01, -1, 'linefit')
| mv-expand hahaha_series to typeof(long), 
            timestamp to typeof(datetime), 
            capture_the_flag = series_decompose_anomalies_hahaha_series_ad_flag to typeof(long)
| where capture_the_flag == 1
| order by timestamp asc
| extend Hax0r = unicode_codepoints_to_string(pack_array(hahaha_series))
| summarize kust0 = strcat_array(make_list(Hax0r), '');
let MyFavoritePhrase = hash("Kusto Language is Fun!");
let word = datatable(mix_it_up: int, super_secret: long)
[
    1, 3154138337821812041,
    2, 3154138337821812038,
    3, 3154138337821812039,
    4, 3154138337821812060,
    5, 3154138337821812032,
    6, 3154138337821812045,
    7, 3154138337821812058 
];
let you = word
| extend Azure = binary_xor(super_secret, MyFavoritePhrase)
| order by mix_it_up asc
| extend Hax0r = unicode_codepoints_to_string(pack_array(Azure))
| summarize kust0 = strcat_array(make_list(Hax0r), '');
let cod3 = datatable(rating:int, random_numberzzzzz:int)
[
    1, 5625,
    2, 13689,
    3, 13225,
    4, 13456,
    5, 12321
];
let confused = cod3
| extend code = toint(sqrt(random_numberzzzzz))
| order by rating asc
| extend Hax0r = unicode_codepoints_to_string(pack_array(code))
| summarize kust0 = strcat_array(make_list(Hax0r), '');
let scary_function = (dangerous_input: string) {
let d1 = iif(substring(dangerous_input, 0, 1) == "1", 128, 0);
let d2 = iif(substring(dangerous_input, 1, 1) == "1", 64, 0);
let d3 = iif(substring(dangerous_input, 2, 1) == "1", 32, 0);
let d4 = iif(substring(dangerous_input, 3, 1) == "1", 16, 0);
let d5 = iif(substring(dangerous_input, 4, 1) == "1", 8, 0);
let d6 = iif(substring(dangerous_input, 5, 1) == "1", 4, 0);
let d7 = iif(substring(dangerous_input, 6, 1) == "1", 2, 0);
let d8 = iif(substring(dangerous_input, 7, 1) == "1", 1, 0);
let dangerous_val = d1 + d2 + d3 + d4 + d5 + d6 + d7 + d8;
print dangerous_input, dangerous_val, Hax0r = unicode_codepoints_to_string(dangerous_val)
};
let lets_get_fancy = dynamic([
    "   A    DDDD    X   X      K   K   QQQQQ   L     ",
    "  A A   D   D    X X       K  K   Q     Q  L     ",
    " AAAAA  D    D    X        KKK    Q     Q  L     ",
    "A     A D   D    X X       K  K   Q  Q  Q  L     ",
    "A     A DDDD    X   X      K   K   QQQ QQ  LLLLL "
]);
let fancy_strings = strcat_array(lets_get_fancy, "\n");
let ADX_KQL = strlen(fancy_strings);
let make_some_TABLEZ = range i from 0 to ADX_KQL - 1 step 1
| extend the_string_of_the_strings = substring(fancy_strings, i, 1)
| where the_string_of_the_strings != " " and the_string_of_the_strings != "\n"
| summarize what_are_we_actually_counting = count() by the_string_of_the_strings;
let Final = make_some_TABLEZ
| join kind=inner (
    make_some_TABLEZ | summarize what_are_we_actually_counting = tolong(avg(what_are_we_actually_counting))
) on what_are_we_actually_counting
| project Letter = tolower(the_string_of_the_strings);
let its_all_about_the_location = geo_point_to_geohash(-123.1207, 49.2827, 12);  
let more_locations = geo_point_to_geohash(36.817223, -1.286389, 12);
let windows = datatable(rating:int, value:int)
[
    1, 20,
    2, 30,
    3, 51
];
let WindowVal = windows
| serialize
| extend Window = row_cumsum(value)
| where Window == 101
| project Window;
let e = WindowVal
| extend hi = toint(Window / 16), lo = Window % 16
| extend find_the_missing_link = strcat("\\u00", tostring(hi), tostring(lo))
| extend missing_the_string_of_the_string = parse_json(strcat('{"x": "', find_the_missing_link, '"}')).x
| project missing_the_string_of_the_string;
let puzzle = dynamic(["c", "g", "=", "="]);
let pieces = toscalar(
    range i from 0 to array_length(puzzle)-1 step 1
    | summarize make_list(i)
);
let construction_mode = zip(pieces, puzzle);
let building_mode = print construction_mode
| mv-expand pair = construction_mode
| summarize l33t_cod3r = strcat_array(make_list(tostring(pair[1])), "");
let l33t_cod3r_scalar = toscalar(building_mode | project l33t_cod3r);
let secretScroll = strcat("<x encoding='base64'>", l33t_cod3r_scalar, "</x>");
let parsed = parse_xml(secretScroll);
let Content = tostring(parsed.x["#text"]);
let Azure = base64_decode_tostring(Content);
let now = print 
    H = toscalar(toscalar(scary_function("01101000") | project Hax0r)), 
    A = toscalar(Final),                                    
    C = substring(tolower(its_all_about_the_location), 0, 1),
    K = substring(tolower(more_locations), 0, 1),
    E = toscalar(e),
    R = toscalar(Azure)
| project kust0 = strcat(H, A, C, K, E, R);
union hint.concurrency=1 are, you, confused, now
| summarize Result = strcat_array(make_list(kust0), " ")
```
